title: Motherwell battle to draw with Hibernian despite Donnelly red card
shortDescription: Ten-man Motherwell held out for a point in a goalless Premiership encounter with Hibernian.

title: Clark nets late winner as Dundee Utd end losing run
shortDescription: Dundee United finally returned to winning ways in the Premiership with a dramatic 2-1 victory over Ross County at Tannadice.

title: Saints and Dundee remain in trouble after draw
shortDescription: St Johnstone and Dundee both remain in relegation trouble in the cinch Premiership after the Tayside derby ended in a goalless draw.

title: Arfield stunner sees off brave Livi
shortDescription: Scott Arfield's spectacular second-half strike saw Rangers scrape past Livingston 1-0 at Ibrox to maintain their four-point lead over Celtic at the top of the table.

title: Celtic hold on to secure win at Hearts
shortDescription: Celtic survived a second-half comeback from Hearts to win 2-1 and stay four points off Scottish Premiership leaders Rangers.

title: England, Cuthbert strikes fire Chelsea back into second
shortDescription: Beth England and Erin Cuthbert scored to seal Chelsea a 2-0 victory over West Ham and move them back into second in the WSL table behind leaders Arsenal.

title: Papers:  Arsenal switch focus to Douglas Luiz
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Thursday's national newspapers...

title: Mali 0-0 Equatorial Guinea (5-6 pens)
shortDescription: Highlights of the African Cup of Nations match between Mali and Equatorial Guinea.

title: How box-to-box Bruno Guimaraes can bolster Newcastle
shortDescription: Newcastle United are chasing the signature of Bruno Guimaraes, a midfielder with all the attributes to spearhead the Magpies' push for Premier League survival.

title: Man Utd's Iqbal called up by Iraq to face Iran: 'It's an honour'
shortDescription: Manchester United's Zidane Iqbal called up to play in World Cup qualifiers in Iran and Lebanon after Sky Sports News revealed Iraq were ready to hand teenager full cap.

title: Ivory Coast 0-0 Egypt (4-5 Pens)
shortDescription: Highlights of the Africa Cup of Nations last-16 match between Ivory Coast and Egypt.

title: 'It was time to speak' - Haaland defends comments over Dortmund 'pressure'
shortDescription: Erling Haaland says it is time to "move on" from comments he made earlier this month where he said Borussia Dortmund were pressuring him to make a decision on his future.

title: Salah scores after Bailly miss as Egypt edge Ivorians on pens
shortDescription: Mohamed Salah scored Egypt's winning penalty after Eric Bailly missed for Ivory Coast in a dramatic shoot-out following a 0-0 draw in the Africa Cup of Nations last-16.

title: Bailly's costly shoot-out miss: 'Why'd he do that?!'
shortDescription: Manchester United and Ivory Coast defender Eric Bailly saw his penalty saved in the shootout against Egypt; a miss which proved costly as his team were knocked out.

title: Infantino comments on African migrants 'completely unacceptable'
shortDescription: FIFA president Gianni Infantino's comments about African migrants have been described as "completely unacceptable" by Kick It Out chief executive Tony Burnett.

title: Green on Arsenal vs Brighton: Recent results show anything can happen
shortDescription: After a few shock recent results in the WSL, Brighton Women's Kayleigh Green says "anything can happen" as the Seagulls face Arsenal Women live on Sky Sports.

title: Analysis: Could Ramsey still cut it in the PL?
shortDescription: Could Aaron Ramsey still cut it in the Premier League? What could he bring to Burnley? Sky Sports' Jack Wilkinson examines his Juventus and Wales form for answers...

title: Pereira: 'It's time for Everton decisions' | 'Critics don't know me'
shortDescription: Everton managerial candidate Vitor Pereira says "it is a time for decisions" as he waits to hear whether he will be handed the role as Rafael Benitez's successor.

title: Manchester derby, Liverpool vs Man Utd live on Sky Sports in March
shortDescription: The Manchester derby plus Liverpool vs Man Utd are among the Premier League fixtures to be shown live on Sky Sports in March.

title: Aubameyang left out of Arsenal squad for Dubai training camp
shortDescription: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has been left out of Arsenal's squad for their training camp in Dubai and will instead remain in London to keep up his fitness.
